content:
RichTextBoxWordPunctuations Enum

Definition

Specifies the types of punctuation tables that can be used with the RichTextBox control's word-wrapping and word-breaking features.

In this Article

public enum RichTextBoxWordPunctuations
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
RichTextBoxWordPunctuations

Fields

All

Used as a mask.
Custom

Use a custom defined punctuation table.
Level1

Use pre-defined Level 1 punctuation table as default.
Level2

Use pre-defined Level 2 punctuation table as default.
